summary: Defines test models and custom QuerySet subclasses used to examine how Django querysets are pickled and unpickled across different Django versions, including handling of missing version metadata and providing a simple numeric model for auxiliary tests.
business_intent: Support testing of queryset serialization behavior by offering specialized querysets that isolate records with absent or previous Django version information and a basic model exposing a static number, facilitating validation of versionâ€‘aware pickling mechanisms.
